This atmosphere is expected to continue for the time being.

According to the game industry on the 29th, Netmarble, Sunday Toz, and Com2us are drawing attention by steadily delivering news of mergers and acquisitions and equity investments.

News of the merger and acquisition is expected to continue.

This is because Wemade, which has recently attracted attention from blockchain platform Wemix and Mir4 global box office success, is also planning to join the merger and acquisition through its subsidiary Wemade Max.

Wemade also announced its plan to convert Wemade Max into a blockchain game developer and use it as a platform for mergers and acquisitions of successful game companies.
